front.title: Structure of the IETF Administrative Support Activity (IASA)

abstract.t: This document describes the structure of the IETF Administrative Support Activity (IASA) as an IETF-controlled activity housed within the Internet Society (ISOC) legal umbrella. It defines the roles and responsibilities of the IETF Administrative Oversight Committee (IAOC), the IETF Administrative Director (IAD) and the ISOC Board of Trustees in the fiscal and administrative support of the IETF standards process. It also defines how the IAOC will be comprised and selected.
